name: The Anomaly (BeastieBaiter, Karane, froggikit)
description:
A month ago, an anomaly was found in a remote village. A team of scientists was sent to investigate the site and they found a big hole into the core of the earth. After multiple attempts to crack the mystery, the team desperately sends a man down the hole. You are that man.

Programming:

  • Maria Gomes
  • João Pamplona
  • Afonso Leitão

Art:

  • Kit
  • Andreia Santos

Narrative

  • Maria Gomes

Music

  • Afonso Leitão

Tileset by ansimus

A game made in association with GameDev Técnico
